1028970.name: Tokyo Warfare Turbo - Nature maps expansion
1028970.description:
This MAP EXPANSION adds three new maps featuring desert and snowy landscapes.

DESERT MAP 1 - Smoky freedom
Features a bast desert map that spreads the action along the burning oil fields, oil refinery and a detailed military base, inspired on the first gulf war.

DESERT MAP 2 - Dark Horizon
This less complex and smaller map is designed to keep you in a constant firefight with enemy forces, dust trails, smoke from damaged tanks and explosions will make the battlezone a complete mayhem, a good place to take advantage of thermal vision.

WINTERMAP - Winterlands
This Icy middle sized map featuring frozen vegetation and varying visibility concentrates the action mainly in its middle area, but don´t get too comfy while heading as you may be blown to pieces in the way. Also a good place to locate enemies using the thermals.
1028970.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
